original: Abyākataṁ vipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam vipākam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Kusalaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Kusalaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Kusalaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo
analyzed: kusalam vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo ca na akusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo
ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Akusalaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: akusalam vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Akusalaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: akusalam vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Akusalaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo
analyzed: akusalam vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo ca na akusalaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo

original: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
abyākatam neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam na iva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ
na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhamma

original: paṭicca nakusalo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca naakusalo nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo
analyzed: paṭicca na kusalaḥ na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammo ca na akusalaḥ na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammo

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
